full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTI Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS; FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I, JAMES M. McGeeveR , residing at 6675 HOMESTEAD Ave E. (Name) (Street and number) TACOMA WASH 98404 USA (City) (State) (ZIP Code, if in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on MAY 5,1944 at PHiLADeLPHiA PA, USA Also, answer either a, b or C, as appro- (Date) (City) (Country) priate, if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization . (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship . If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number . 2. That I am 30 years of age and have resided in the United States since BiRTH 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 6675 Homestead Ave. TACOMA NAME SEX AGE COUNTRY OF BIRTH MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO SINGLE DEPONENT WHAT TH; NGUYeN F 68 VieTNAM MARRieD MOTHER-IN-LAW (WIDOW) NORTHWEST ReGioNAL 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of EDUCATIONAL RESPARCH with EDUCATIONAL LABORATORY 313 S. 129th st. (Name of concern) at TACOMA, WASH and derive a net annual income of $ $8,649.48 (b) That I have on, deposit in savings (Address) banks in this country $1,130.90 (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $5,000 - (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $ , market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at 6675 HOMESTEAD Avet. TAGOMA valued at $22,000 , with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $ $17,832.02 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $85,000 , cash surrender value of $ 600.00 (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See reverse side for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.)
